name: Topkey
description: Topkey is the all-in-one financial operating platform that simplifies expense management for hospitality managers.

founders.name: Jonathan Sukhia, Founder
founders.description: Former Head of Global Management Company Partnerships, Hotels team at Airbnb and previously HotelTonight. Former Associate Director M&A at Starwood Hotels, led sale of Starwood’s timeshare vacation rental business. Started career in investment banking at Wells Fargo Securities. Master of Management from Duke’s Fuqua School of Business. Undergraduate degrees in accounting and finance from Florida State University. Originally from Tallahassee, Florida.

founders.name: Bryan Beshore, Founder
founders.description:
Bryan is a full-stack web developer who started in design and product roles, with experience in building cross-functional teams as both a founder/CEO. I have built or helped build 4-companies in the past. Two SaaS based products and two e-Commerce based products. Post founding my YC company, I personally built an e-commerce company with GMV over $250,000 in revenue the first year with no ad spend.

Personal website is: bryanbeshore.com

# Financial automation for property managers
Automated expenses, bill pay, bookkeeping, corporate cards, and banking - all in one place and integrated to your PMS and accounting software.
[Learn More](https://www.topkey.io/<#>)
Topkey is a financial technology company and is not a bank. Banking services provided by Thread Bank, Member FDIC. The Topkey Visa Debit & Charge Cards are issued by Thread Bank pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc and may be used anywhere Visa cards are accepted. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6501039d01e9f454b7135197/656e7ed125e4a536f32564c9_Group%2039464.png)
## Make efficiency your standard
We help you maximize your financial output and close the books 5x faster.
![Image cards depicting transactions](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6501039d01e9f454b7135197/6503b3203ae81612c674cf07_Every%20Cent%20Image.png)
### Every cent accounted for.
Bring more order to your operations with technology that removes the possibility of expensive errors and oversights.
![Card depicting mobile prompts](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6501039d01e9f454b7135197/6503b65d0bbbe2ea72844e48_Stay%20On%20The%20Money.png)
### Stay on the money
Mobile prompts prevent transactions from falling through the cracks.
![Image depicting workflow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6501039d01e9f454b7135197/6503b68067c6dfef12c5fc0c_One%20Workflow.png)

Make monthly reconciliation a breeze and grow your operations with a single banking solution.

### Topkey: Simplifying Finances for Hospitality

**Overview:**
Topkey, founded in 2021 and based in San Francisco, is an innovative financial operating platform specifically designed to serve hospitality managers. As a member of Y Combinator W21, Topkey aims to revolutionize the way property managers handle their finances by streamlining expense management.

**Mission:**
While the specific mission statement isn't detailed, Topkey’s core focus clearly centers on reducing the complexities of financial operations within the hospitality industry, enhancing both efficiency and accuracy.

**We’re Talking Fintech:**
Topkey operates at the intersection of finance and technology, specifically targeting areas like fin-tech, real estate, and property tech. This positioning enables them to provide tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of property management.

#### Key Features:
Topkey provides an all-in-one platform that includes:
- **Automated Expense Tracking:** Easily track, tag, and filter expenses on-the-go.
- **Bill Pay Automations:** Simplify accounts payable processes.
- **Corporate Cards:** Issue unlimited Visa cards while maintaining control over spending.
- **Integrated Bookkeeping:** Close monthly books in record time.
- **Banking Solutions:** Access full banking products specifically crafted for property managers.

**Products:**
1. **Banking**: Full banking products tailored for property management.
2. **Corporate Cards**: Control over issued Visa cards.
3. **Expense Management**: Easy tracking and management of expenses.
4. **Bill Pay**: Automate and streamline payable accounts.
5. **Bookkeeping**: Reduce time spent on monthly reconciliations.

**Team Structure:**
The company currently operates with a small, focused team of five employees. Jared Friedman serves as a Group Partner, guiding Topkey through its initial growth phases.

**Customer-Centric Approach:**
Topkey stresses the importance of customer feedback, showing a commitment to constantly evolving their services based on user needs. Their platform claims to save property managers considerable time and cost through automation and integrative approaches.

**Connect with Topkey:**
They offer potential clients a chance to learn more through demos, making it easy for interested parties to explore how Topkey can enhance their financial efficiency.

**Website & Contact:**
Explore more on their [website](https://www.topkey.io) and consider booking a demo to see the benefits firsthand.

**Conclusion:**
Topkey isn’t just another fintech startup; it’s poised to make significant strides in the hospitality financial management space. By focusing on automation and integration, Topkey stands to save property managers not just money, but precious time that can be redirected towards growing their businesses. If you’re in the hospitality industry still elbow-deep in spreadsheets, it might be time to let technology do the heavy lifting.
